verses.name: Genesis 31:44
verses.text: Now therefore come thou, let us make a covenant, I and thou; and let it be for a witness between me and thee.

verses.name: Genesis 31:45
verses.text: And Jacob took a stone, and set it up for a pillar.

verses.name: Genesis 31:46
verses.text: And Jacob said unto his brethren, Gather stones; and they took stones, and made an heap: and they did eat there upon the heap.

verses.name: Genesis 31:47
verses.text: And Laban called it Jegar–sahadutha: but Jacob called it Galeed.

verses.name: Genesis 31:48
verses.text: And Laban said, This heap is a witness between me and thee this day. Therefore was the name of it called Galeed;
